member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: Returns the price for the car, which is fixed at 240.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of the vehicle, which is "Car".
member.returns: A string representing the vehicle type, "Car".

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.MC.Price
member.summary: Returns the price for the motorcycle, which is fixed at 125.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.MC.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of the vehicle, which is "MC".
member.returns: A string representing the vehicle type, "MC".

member.name: T:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle
member.summary: Represents a base class for different types of vehicles.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Licenseplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the license plate of the vehicle. Throws an exception if the license plate exceeds 7 characters.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date associated with the vehicle (e.g., parking or ticket date).

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.HasBrobizz
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Brobizz is used.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.ApplyBrobizzDiscount(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the price of the vehicle, applying a Brobizz discount if applicable. Must be implemented by derived classes.
member.returns: The price of the vehicle with an optional Brobizz discount.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the vehicle. Must be implemented by derived classes.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of the vehicle. Must be implemented by derived classes.
member.returns: A string representing the vehicle type.
